backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product catalog, updates, contacts, user profiles, admin management with strict owner-only admin control, and role-based access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting files and components involved in enforcing owner‑only access for the /admin/access route.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their functionality and purpose in the application.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Guide explaining how to configure DNS and boundary node settings to use a custom domain with the deployed app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variables setup defining theme colors, fonts, and utility classes like honeycomb backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file containing the root div and script entry point for the frontend application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration wiring all site and admin routes, using AdminRouteGuard and OwnerOnlyRouteGuard for protected sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that checks Internet Identity login and admin status, showing login prompts or access‑denied UI when required.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Route guard that checks Internet Identity authentication and owner status, showing login or access‑denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic query cache clearing and retry logic if already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable styled primitives for sections, containers, cards, badges, and buttons with consistent brand styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, navigation links, and a newsletter signup form with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation links, admin link, mobile menu, shop button, and login control using dynamic logo loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, main outlet, background pattern, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Displays a product update card with type badge, date, title, and preview text linking to the update detail page.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Shows formatted price with optional original price and discount percentage in variable size styles.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product card showing image, availability, description, price, and variant count, linking to product details.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Disabled Add‑to‑Cart button with an alert indicating that online checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Renders weight or flavor variant buttons, tracks selected index, and notifies parent of price and label changes.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and a helper to verify if a given principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context, login/logout handling, and loads or creates an AuthClient for Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns standard polling and refetch settings for live updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets document title and meta description on page load with a special case for the owner dashboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend product and admin API calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About Us page with brand story, ethical beekeeping info, and page meta setup.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Provides admin management tools to list, add, and remove admin principals with validation and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays the admin dashboard with navigation cards for managing products, news, and site content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Admin page for uploading, validating, previewing, and updating the site logo with mutation hooks and file handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Admin interface to create, list, sort, and delete product news updates with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin dashboard for creating, editing, filtering, and deleting products with variant support and dialog forms.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Shows certification, quality assurance, and lab testing details with supporting visuals and meta tags.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via mutation, and success or error alerts. Also renders contact page layout with form fields and messaging UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage hero, navigation buttons, and highlight cards showcasing product trust features. Uses page metadata and navigation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific news update, including metadata, date, message, and related product info. Handles loading, missing updates, and type badges.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed list of product updates filtered by type, with sorting, loading states, and last-updated info. Fetches and displays update cards for each category.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with structured sections describing data collection, usage, sharing, and security. Includes page metadata and styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information, handles variant selection, and fetches product data and updates using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a categorized product listing with tabs, fetching products by category and updating the view accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with static sections and page metadata setup.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Utility to normalize asset URLs by encoding only the filename segment.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Helpers to convert backend logo data into object URLs and revoke them to free memory.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Price formatting and discount utilities plus helpers to compute display and original prices.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity Principals, preventing anonymous admins and providing truncated display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme options, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including feature requirements for enforcing self-only admin access via a specific Internet Identity principal.
